title: Verify Rewind Button
custom_preconds: Given a user is playing a video
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks rewind
custom_expected:
THEN video rewinds by 15 secs
AND rewind is clicked multiple times
THEN video rewinds in increments

title: Verify Play Button/unpause
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media and the media is paused
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the media should play

title: Verify Pause Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media and the media is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the pause button
custom_expected: THEN the media should pause

title: Verify FastForward Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is playing media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks FastForward
custom_expected:
THEN media is forwarded by 15 secs
AND FastForward is clicked multiple times 
THEN media is forwarded by 15 secs in increments

title: Verify Mute Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media and the media has sound
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the mute toggle button
custom_expected: THEN the media should mute

title: Verify Un-Mute Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media and the media is muted
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the mute toggle button
custom_expected: THEN the media should un-mute

title: Verify Volume is Resumed When Un-Muted
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media and media has sound
custom_steps: WHEN the user reduces volume and clicks the mute toggle button
custom_expected:
THEN the media is muted 
AND the user clicks un-mute
THEN the volume should be the same as when the user reduced it previously

title: Verify Volume Reduce To Zero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is playing media 
AND the media has sound
custom_steps: WHEN the user slides volume slider to absolute left
custom_expected: THEN the volume is reduced to zero

title: Verify Volume Increased To 100
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is playing media
AND the volume is set to zero
custom_steps: WHEN the user slides the volume slider to the absolute right
custom_expected: THEN the volume is increased to 100

title: Verify FullScreen Enter Button
custom_preconds: Given user is playing media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the fullscreen button
custom_expected: THEN the video player is enlarged to fullscreen

title: Verify FullScreen Exit Button
custom_preconds:
Given user is playing media
AND video player is in fullscreen veiw
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the fullscreen button
custom_expected: THEN the video player exits fullscreen

title: Verify Archive Progress Bar Media Progress
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media
custom_steps: WHEN media progresses through time
custom_expected: THEN the progress bar indicates the correct current position of the media in the timeline

title: Verify Archive Progress Bar Seek
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks and drags the progress bar thumb elsewhere in the timeline
custom_expected:
THEN the media seeks to that point in the timeline
AND the progress bar indicates the correct current position of the media in the timeline

title: Verify Live Progress Bar At Live Point
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is playing live media at live point
custom_steps: WHEN media progresses through time
custom_expected: THEN the media player shows the progress bar thumb at the far right

title: Verify Live Progress Bar Not At Live Point
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing live media not at live point
custom_steps: WHEN media progresses through time
custom_expected: THEN the progress bar indicates the correct current position of the media in the timeline

title: Verify Live Progress Bar Seek
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing live media
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks and drags the progress bar thumb elsewhere in the timeline
custom_expected:
THEN the media seeks to that point in the timeline
AND the progress bar indicates the correct current position of the media in the timeline

title: Verify Live Progress Bar Seeks To The Live Point
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing live media not at the live point
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks and drags the progress bar thumb near the live point
custom_expected:
THEN the media seeks to that point in the timeline
AND the progress bar shows the thumb at the far right of the progress bar

title: Verify Live Button When Not At Live Point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is playing live media not on live point
AND live button shows non-live state
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks live button
custom_expected: THEN the media seeks to live point

title: Verify Live Button When Media At Live Point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is playing live media at live point
AND live button shows the live state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks live button
custom_expected: THEN the media player performs no action

title: VOD Hover State*
custom_preconds: Given user is a subscriber
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over a video to see the full description
custom_expected:
THEN user can see the full description of the video (max 140 characters in forge).

There is animation effect on the video tile hover effect

Removing the cursor from hover state will return the tile to normal size

The hover state may overlap or cover neighboring videos which is fine.

Designs
https://mlb.invisionapp.com/freehand/document/29pD1jNr9 (Highfi 03 - Hover state on VOD)

title: Carousel Styling and Behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEn user views the carouusel
custom_expected:
THEN
The carousel has arrows on both ends to navigate tiles

The carousel arrow should only show if there are more items to navigate to in either direction

The carousel should update all items visible with each click

Start with the default animation transition effect

No infinite loop on the carousels

title: Require MVPD auth for MLBN Player
Logged out user Redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user visits the MLBN playback page
custom_expected: THEN the user is redirected to the MLBN login page

title: MVPD Authorization Redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in, but does not have MVPD authorization
custom_steps: WHEN the user visits the MLBN playback page
custom_expected: THEN the user is redirected to the MVPD auth flow page

title: A-Net media playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and has MVPD authorization
custom_steps:
WHEN the user visits the MLBN playback page
AND the user is not in a blackout zip code block
custom_expected: THEN the user gets playback of the “a-net” feed

title: B-Net media playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and has MVPD authorization
custom_steps:
WHEN the user visits the MLBN playback page
AND the user is in a blackout zip code block for A-Net
custom_expected: THEN the user gets playback of the “B-Net” feed

title: C-Net media playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and has MVPD authorization
custom_steps:
WHEN the user visits the MLBN playback page
AND the user is in a blackout zip code block for A-Net and B-Net
custom_expected: THEN the user gets playback of the “C-Net” looping slate
